## SendableEthersKumo.withdrawKUSDFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw KUSD from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawKUSDFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, asset: string, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersKumoTransaction<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of KUSD to withdraw. |
|  asset | string |  |

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and .
